Higher-Ed

Learn more

Did you know? Only 89% of CEOs are not confident that students are ready for the workforce.

Stay ahead of change with Lyra.

For organizations to compete today, they must create a culture of learning that keeps their teams ahead of industry disrupting change. Lyra helps create and support a learning culture, enabling learning that is scalable—boosting the engine that drives innovation and creates organizational value. Lyra is the first and only learning system to use a unique high-tech, high-touch approach that puts individuals and teams into measurable problem solving experiences. Lyra processes multiple layers of data on underlying competencies to give participants a rich picture of their performance and a better understanding of how to develop self-awareness, skills, and strategies that drive daily innovation.
